Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.authentication

Class Helpers

java.lang.Object
oracle.kubernetes.operator.authentication.Helpers
public class Helpers
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides helper methods for getting Service Accounts and Secrets for authentication purposes.

    Construct helpers.

  • Method Details

    • findServiceAccount

      protected io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ServiceAccount findServiceAccount​(java.lang.String serviceAccountName, java.lang.String namespace) throws io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException
      Find the servivce account by name.
      Parameters:
      serviceAccountName - The name of the Service Account.
      namespace - The Namespace the Service Account is defined in.
      Returns:
      V1ServiceAccount object that matches the requested Service Account name and Namespace (if found).
      Throws:
      io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException - if an API error occurs.

    • getAllServiceAccounts

      protected io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ServiceAccountList getAllServiceAccounts() throws io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException
      Get a list of all Service Accounts on this cluster. Only looking at the first 4K accounts.
      Returns:
      A list of Service Accounts.
      Throws:
      io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException - on API Exception

    • findServiceAccountByToken

      protected io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ServiceAccount findServiceAccountByToken​(java.lang.String token) throws io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException
      Find the service account by supplied token.
      Parameters:
      token - authentication token to search for
      Returns:
      V1ServiceAccount where token is secreted
      Throws:
      io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException - if there is an API error

    • readSecretByReference

      protected io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Secret readSecretByReference​(io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectReference reference, java.lang.String namespace) throws io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException
      Read a secret by its object reference.
      Parameters:
      reference - V1ObjectReference An object reference to the Secret you want to read.
      namespace - The Namespace where Secret is defined.
      Returns:
      V1Secret The requested Secret.
      Throws:
      io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException - if there is an API error.
